title: Image Manifest
description: Schema for the image_manifest.json file, describing a collection of images and their metadata.

relativePath.description: Path to the image relative to the web server root directory (/mnt/Web), using POSIX separators. Includes 'photos/' prefix.

filename.description: The name of the image file.

year.description: Year extracted from the folder structure or EXIF data.

month.description: Month extracted from the folder structure or EXIF data.

day.description: Day extracted from the folder structure or EXIF data.

width.description: Width of the image in pixels.

height.description: Height of the image in pixels.

dateTaken.description: Date and time the photo was taken, in ISO 8601 format. Null if not available.

title.description: Title of the image, often from EXIF ImageDescription or ObjectName. Null if not available.

description.description: Description of the image, often from EXIF UserComment. Null if not available.

tags.description: A list of keywords/tags associated with the image, from XMP dc:subject or EXIF XPKeywords. Null if no tags.

cameraModel.description: Camera model used, from EXIF Model. Null if not available.

lensModel.description: Lens model used, from EXIF LensModel, cleaned of null characters. Null if not available.

flash.description: Indicates if the flash fired. True if fired, false if not, null if unknown.

focalLength.description: Focal length of the lens in millimeters (e.g., 50.0 for 50mm). Null if not available.

focalLength35mmEquiv.description: Focal length in 35mm film equivalent (e.g., 28 for 28mm equivalent). Null if not available.

focalLengthCategory.description: Classification of focal length: ultra-wide (<24mm), wide (24-34mm), normal (35-69mm), short-telephoto (70-134mm), telephoto (135-299mm), super-telephoto (>=300mm). Based on 35mm equivalent. Null if not available.

cropFactor.description: Sensor crop factor relative to full-frame 35mm (e.g., 1.0 for full-frame, 1.5 for APS-C, 2.0 for Micro Four Thirds). Calculated from focal length and 35mm equivalent. Null if not available.

apertureValue.description: Aperture F-number (e.g., 2.8 for f/2.8). Null if not available.

isoSpeedRatings.description: ISO speed rating. Null if not available.

exposureTime.description: Exposure time in seconds (e.g., 0.004 for 1/250s). Null if not available.

creator.description: Name of the photographer or creator, from EXIF Artist or XMP dc:creator. Null if not available.

copyright.description: Copyright information, from EXIF Copyright or XMP dc:rights. Null if not available.

notes.description: Notes or additional comments about the image, from XMP xmp:notes (Darktable-specific). Null if not available.

slug.description: A URL-friendly slug derived from the relativePath, e.g., 'photos-2025-03-04-DSC_1234'.
